item.title: Welcome, XSX: Cheap Dedicated Server Offer in Singapore ($29.75/Month!) and Cheap VPS Deals, Too!
item.description:
Welcome, XSX: Cheap Dedicated Server Offer in Singapore ($29.75/Month!) and Cheap VPS Deals, Too!

Intel Xeon E3-1230v3 CPU
16GB RAM
1 x 480G SATA SSD
10TB transfer
1Gbps uplink
3 IPv4
IPMI: yes
Coupon: LEBSGoffer-E3
$29.75/month
Now, this Dedicated Server is interesting. I’m thinking installing Proxmox.

item.title: The FASTEST Way to Document a Power BI Model
item.description:
The FASTEST Way to Document a Power BI Model

Tools like data dictionaries play a critical – and often overlooked – role for Power BI developers, capturing important information about the tables, columns, measures and relationships in a data model.
We need to start documenting our data model with these tools.
item.content:encoded:
The FASTEST Way to Document a Power BI Model

Tools like data dictionaries play a critical – and often overlooked – role for Power BI developers, capturing important information about the tables, columns, measures and relationships in a data model.
We need to start documenting our data model with these tools.

item.title: VLC Remote Control for Android & iPhone - VLC Mobile Remote
item.description:
VLC Remote Control for Android & iPhone - VLC Mobile Remote

This VLC Remote app for iPhone, Android & iPad lets you control VLC Player on PC or Mac. Also browse, play computer files & YouTube, Netflix, Prime videos.
No groping in the dark for keyboard shortcuts, no racing to your computer to change the music, and no watching whatever plays for the lack of motivation to get off your couch. Just install the app, sit back, relax and remotely control VLC Player, Netflix, YouTube and Amazon Prime at your fingertips
item.content:encoded:
VLC Remote Control for Android & iPhone - VLC Mobile Remote

This VLC Remote app for iPhone, Android & iPad lets you control VLC Player on PC or Mac. Also browse, play computer files & YouTube, Netflix, Prime videos.
No groping in the dark for keyboard shortcuts, no racing to your computer to change the music, and no watching whatever plays for the lack of motivation to get off your couch. Just install the app, sit back, relax and remotely control VLC Player, Netflix, YouTube and Amazon Prime at your fingertips

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JV3QW05FEE8SNXBSTFJT9WWS
item.description: Is it just me, or does anyone else find @silverbulletmd slow and clunky when navigating or taking notes? I initially thought it was just my machine, but I experienced the same thing on the demo site. It’s a shame—it could’ve been a great note-taking app with its powerful query features.
item.content:encoded: Is it just me, or does anyone else find @silverbulletmd slow and clunky when navigating or taking notes? I initially thought it was just my machine, but I experienced the same thing on the demo site. It’s a shame—it could’ve been a great note-taking app with its powerful query features.

item.title: InvoiceShelf: Open Source Invoicing Solution for Individuals & Businesses
item.description:
InvoiceShelf: Open Source Invoicing Solution for Individuals & Businesses

InvoiceShelf is an open-source web & mobile app that helps you track expenses, payments & create professional invoices & estimates.
Too many images in the compose files, too many moving pieces to manage.
item.content:encoded:
InvoiceShelf: Open Source Invoicing Solution for Individuals & Businesses

InvoiceShelf is an open-source web & mobile app that helps you track expenses, payments & create professional invoices & estimates.
Too many images in the compose files, too many moving pieces to manage.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JTNQVR5MQJR7PFB32C8GVKV5
item.description:
Why I still choose Android over iPhone in 2025

  • Cheaper esp. I’m fine with the Samsung and S FE series
  • SMS spam folder not available in iPhone
  • Interface
  • Native back button or back gesture
item.content:encoded:
Why I still choose Android over iPhone in 2025

  • Cheaper esp. I’m fine with the Samsung and S FE series
  • SMS spam folder not available in iPhone
  • Interface
  • Native back button or back gesture

item.title: URI Match Detection 'Starts with' doesn't work in Chrome on Android · Issue #578 · bitwarden/mobile · GitHub
item.description:
URI Match Detection 'Starts with' doesn't work in Chrome on Android · Issue #578 · bitwarden/mobile · GitHub

URI Match Detection doesn’t work when using ‘Starts with’ in Chrome on Android. For example, using the following URI: https://mail.example.com/admin The above URI format works just fine in Firefox on Android when using ‘Starts with’ as t…
I have the same problem with auto-fill in my Android when using Starts With and with subdomain and folder combination in my URL.
item.content:encoded:
URI Match Detection 'Starts with' doesn't work in Chrome on Android · Issue #578 · bitwarden/mobile · GitHub

URI Match Detection doesn’t work when using ‘Starts with’ in Chrome on Android. For example, using the following URI: https://mail.example.com/admin The above URI format works just fine in Firefox on Android when using ‘Starts with’ as t…
I have the same problem with auto-fill in my Android when using Starts With and with subdomain and folder combination in my URL.
